description.value:
Requirements Your last action was a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.D6a4phlAxmixy2lo]{Hakaze} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.ta4tbDDZBGAoS6on]{Hissatsu Shinten}, you have not used @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.cQyMtZicWB6uMSkV]{Sudden Cruelty} this turn

The strength with which you strike makes a sonic shockwave that deafens your opponent. The creature against which you made your Hakaze or Hissatsu Shinten must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute.
